trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref>, which can include shapes, text, video, images, or other drawings.
The following illustration shows shapes and text that were painted with a DrawingBrush.

![DrawingBrush output examples](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-drawingbrushexamples.png "DrawingBrush output examples") Shapes and text painted with a drawing brush For more information and examples, see [Painting with Images, Drawings, and Visuals](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref> class.
The resulting brush has no content.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref> class that contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> that describes the contents of the brush.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> that describes the contents of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> that describes the contents of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref>.
The default is null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush.Drawing*> dependency property.
To be added.
To be added.
